summary: A mentally unstable woman begins a volatile descent into madness when she suspects her lover has left her for another woman.
cast: Alexis Kendra|Woody Naismith|Elizabeth Sandy|Monda Scott|Hugh Westbourne|Richard Velton|Anna Logan|Ray Grady|Renda Mishalany|Dale Brandenburg|Rachel Alig|Deana Ricks|Janet Peters|Terrance Wentz|Katrina Elizabeth|Grace Demarco|Candice Camille|Kendall Foote|James Deloy Scott|Will Leon|Michael Silva|Emily Lawrence|Steve Craig|Xulan Chen|Leonel Claude|Arleum Curry|Shawna De Rosa|Erica Elson|Mariana Elson|Anna Lillie|Megan Scott|Mike Valley
title: Goddess of Love
